cachepolicy_binding

Binding object showing the resources that can be bound to cachepolicy.

Read/write properties

policyname<String>

Name of the cache policy about which to display details.
Minimum length = 1

Read only properties

cachepolicy_cacheglobal_binding<cachepolicy_cacheglobal_binding[]>

cacheglobal that can be bound to cachepolicy.

cachepolicy_cachepolicylabel_binding<cachepolicy_cachepolicylabel_binding[]>

cachepolicylabel that can be bound to cachepolicy.

cachepolicy_csvserver_binding<cachepolicy_csvserver_binding[]>

csvserver that can be bound to cachepolicy.

cachepolicy_lbvserver_binding<cachepolicy_lbvserver_binding[]>

lbvserver that can be bound to cachepolicy.

Operations

NOTE: In request payload, Mandatory parameters are marked red and bold.

get

get

URL:http://<NS_IP>/nitro/v1/config/cachepolicy_binding/policyname_value<String>

HTTP Method:GET

Response Payload:JSON

{ "errorcode": 0, "message": "Done", "cachepolicy_binding": [ {
      "policyname":<String_value>,
      "cachepolicy_cachepolicylabel_binding":<cachepolicy_cachepolicylabel_binding[]_value>,
      "cachepolicy_lbvserver_binding":<cachepolicy_lbvserver_binding[]_value>,
      "cachepolicy_cacheglobal_binding":<cachepolicy_cacheglobal_binding[]_value>,
      "cachepolicy_csvserver_binding":<cachepolicy_csvserver_binding[]_value>,

}]}
